prompt_base: photorealistic asian fusion warrior, muscular build, black spiky hair, intense determined eyes, fierce expression, 8k cinematic photo, dynamic lighting
feature_prompt: hyperdetailed skin texture, visible veins, subtle energy aura, realistic fabric weave on vest, fluid blue sash texture, padding texture
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, plastic, smooth skin, helmet hair, low quality, deformed anatomy, blurry clothes, (simple background:1.2), normal hair, no fusion earrings
